title: Black Representation In North Carolina
description: A decades long debate has raged over how to ensure minorities have a voice in America. In the third installment of our series, we look at racial gerrymandering.
itunes:title: Black Representation In North Carolina
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Galen Druke
itunes:subtitle: A decades long debate has raged over how to ensure minorities have a voice in America. In the third installment of our series, we look at racial gerrymandering.
